mapper.sql: id, code, value, status, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_account,pid
mapper.select: select id, code, value,pid from area_number where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
select id, code, value,pid from area_number where code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
select id, code, value from area_number where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
select id, code, value from area_number where status = 1 and substring(CONCAT('',code),3,4) = '0000'
select id, code, value from area_number where status = 1 and substring(CONCAT('',code),3,2) != '00' and substring(CONCAT('',code),5,2) = '00'
select id, code, value from area_number where status = 1 and substring(CONCAT('',code),3,2) != '00' and substring(CONCAT('',code),5,2) != '00'
